59 template <class ItemWidgetClass>
60 void TItemModelEditorCompBase<ItemWidgetClass>::OnGuiModelAttached()
61 {
62  BaseClass::OnGuiModelAttached();
63 
64  ibase::IQtItemModelProvider* objectPtr = BaseClass::GetObjectPtr();
65  Q_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
66 
67  QAbstractItemModel* itemModelPtr = const_cast<QAbstractItemModel*>(objectPtr->GetItemModel());
68  if (itemModelPtr != NULL){
69  ItemWidgetClass* viewPtr = BaseClass::GetQtWidget();
70  Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
71 
72  viewPtr->setModel(itemModelPtr);
73  }
74 }
75 
76 
77 // reimplemented (CGuiComponentBase)
78 
79 template <class ItemWidgetClass>
80 void TItemModelEditorCompBase<ItemWidgetClass>::OnGuiCreated()
81 {
82  BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
83 
84  ItemWidgetClass* viewPtr = BaseClass::GetQtWidget();
85 
86  Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
87  Q_ASSERT(m_sortingEnabledAttrPtr.IsValid());
88 
89  viewPtr->setSortingEnabled(*m_sortingEnabledAttrPtr);
90 }
